TopicTitle: Scatterer turns space itself white, planets turn gray (1.7.1, modded)

Articles.Content:
Scatterer has always been uncooperative, but this is a new low. Frequently, even when switching to certain vessels in orbit, the game partially loads the scene before space turns white, but the ship is still perfectly visible. When I remove the mod, the problem completely disappears. Also, most of my relay satellites and even my main station are untouched by the glitch. In addition, when crafts load on the Launchpad, the glitch is consistently present. Down below I've included a screenshot of the glitch, the KSP.log, and the output log from my last session.

Output Log:  https://www.dropbox.com/s/4edqfucu5b9ax3b/output_log.txt?dl=0

KSP Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7kghylxc4c43cim/KSP.log?dl=0

Screenshot: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vpt6alosv99iy5s/screenshot15.png?dl=0
